main event: A UFO sighting was recorded on December 15, 1963, in Kettering, Ohio, where an object resembling a signal rocket was observed through slight overcast conditions.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 3-4 seconds,The object looked spherical and had a trail,It appeared to go out like a light,Weather conditions were overcast,The report suggests that the sighting may have been a meteor.
sighted object: a spherical object resembling a signal rocket
witness description: Witness details were redacted in the report.
